contentText: See and manage the basic configurations of your domain.

notif.delete_fail: Failed to delete. Please try again

message.delete: Are you sure want to delete?

warning.select_scheme: Please select at least one scheme.
warning.select_http_port: Please select at least one http port.
warning.select_https_port: Please select at least one https port.

tooltip.service_name: The name of your service profile
tooltip.customer_package: A Customer Package can be setup in multiple line for you to assign it accordingly
tooltip.origin_address: The address of your origin web server
tooltip.origin_scheme: The scheme of your origin web server using. Note if the origin web server has setup 302 redirect to https, the origin scheme must set to https
tooltip.port_mapping_type: Static port mapping means origins have same port listened as frontend
tooltip.scheme: The scheme you want to setup for your site, http or https. *Recommend to use both of them, as https povide fast and secure connection
tooltip.http_port: Default(80) HTTP Port, edit or add the value in this field. Usable HTTP ports are : 8080, 8880, 2052, 2082, 2086, 2095
tooltip.https_port: Default(443) HTTPS Port, edit or add the value in this field. Usable HTTPS ports are : any ports in 1001-4999, any ports in 6001-32767 excludes http usable ports
tooltip.redirect_https: Enable force to redirect from http to https
tooltip.hsts: HTTP Strict Transport Security is a policy mechanism that helps to protect websites against man-in-the-middle attacks such as protocol downgrade attacks and cookie hijacking.
